Package org.goplanit.utils.network.layer.physical

Interface LinkSegment

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Comparable<IdAble>, EdgeSegment, ExternalIdAble, GraphEntity, IdAble, ManagedId, Serializable
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    MacroscopicLinkSegment
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    LinkSegmentBase, MacroscopicLinkSegmentImpl
    public interface LinkSegment
extends EdgeSegment
    Interface for link segments (directional) part of link (non-directional).
    Author:
    markr

      Modifier and Type Method Description
      LinkSegment deepClone()
      An id entity should always support a deep copy, i.e., all "owned" members will be deep copied when a clone of this instance is created via this call.

      • deepClone

        LinkSegment deepClone()
        An id entity should always support a deep copy, i.e., all "owned" members will be deep copied when a clone of this instance is created via this call. To be used with caution if not called by managed id container related code
        Specified by:
